DOC.brief_summary: This single center , single arm , open-label phase 2 study determine efficacy autologous T cell express CD19 chimeric antigen receptor express tandem TCRζ 4-1BB ( TCRζ/4-1BB ) co-stimulatory domain ( refer `` CART19 '' cell ) adult minimal residual disease ( MRD ) upfront treatment CD19+ acute lymphoblastic leukemia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients CD19+ , B cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia ( BALL ) 0.01 % ≤MRD < 10 % upfront treatment 2 . Patients must within 18 month initial ALL diagnosis 3 . Age ≥18 year 4 . Adequate organ function define : 1 . Creatinine ≤ grade 2 2 . ALT/AST ≤3x upper limit normal range age 3 . Direct bilirubin ≤2.0 mg/dl 4 . Adequate pulmonary function define ≤ grade 2 dyspnea ≤ grade 2 hypoxia 5 . Cardiac Left Ventricle Ejection Fraction ( LVEF ) ≥ 40 % confirm ECHO/MUGA 5 . Patients CNS3 disease eligible CNS disease responsive therapy . 6 . Expression CD19 leukemic blast demonstrate flow cytometry immunohistochemistry bone marrow peripheral blood 7 . Adequate performance status define ECOG Performance Status 0 1 8 . Provides write informed consent 9 . Subjects reproductive potential must agree use acceptable birth control method , describe protocol 1 . Active , uncontrolled infection 2 . Active hepatitis B hepatitis C 3 . HIV Infection 4 . Class III/IV cardiovascular disability accord New York Heart Association Classification ( see Appendix 2 ) 5 . Subjects clinically apparent arrhythmia arrhythmia stable medical management within two week enrollment . 6 . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman 7 . Patients known history prior diagnosis optic neuritis immunologic inflammatory disease affect central nervous system , unrelated leukemia previous leukemia treatment .
